featured.text: How is the information about totem poles organized in Paragraphs 2 to 4? (A)

definition.zh_def: 段落；一段文字，通常由多個句子組成，表達一個完整的思想或主題。
definition.en_def: A distinct section of a piece of writing, usually consisting of multiple sentences that express a complete thought or theme.
definition.example: The essay was divided into several paragraphs, each focusing on a different aspect of the topic.
